tab1.text1:
<TextStyle.Yellow>WELCOME TO THE SERVER! THIS IS A PVE SERVER WITH SLIGHTLY BOOSTED RATES TO REMOVE A LOT OF THE TEDIOUSNESS OF ARK WHILE PRESERVING YOUR ENJOYMENT.</>


<TextStyle.Yellow>THIS SERVER IS SELF-HOSTED ON A DEDICATED SERVER IN OKLAHOMA, UNITED STATES ON A DEDICATED FIBER CONNECTION.</>


<TextStyle.Yellow>IF YOU HAVE ANY QUESTIONS, PLEASE FEEL FREE TO ASK EITHER IN GAME OR IN DISCORD. THE DISCORD LINK IS AT THE BOTTOM OF THE PAGE</>


<TextStyle.Yellow>*****RATES ARE DOUBLED ON THE WEEKENDS*****</>

tab2.text1:
<TextStyle.Yellow>SOME CURSING IS ALLOWED, BUT PLEASE KEEP IT IN MODERATION</>

<TextStyle.Yellow>PLEASE DO NOT INSULT/BULLY OTHER PLAYERS. IF THERE IS A CONFLICT PLEASE REACH OUT TO AN ADMIN</>

<TextStyle.Yellow>PLEASE DO NOT BUILD ON/NEAR HIGH RESOURCE AREAS OR POI'S. SOME EXAMPLES WOULD BE METAL MOUNTAINS, VOLCANO, CARNO ISLAND.</>

<TextStyle.Yellow>PLEASE KEEP YOUR BUILDS TO 1 PRIMARY BASE AND 1 OUTPOST BASE. ADMINS RESERVE THE RIGHT TO ASK YOU TO TEAR DOWN IF YOU BUILD IN TOO MANY PLACES</>

<TextStyle.Yellow>PLEASE STEALING IS STRICTLY FORBIDDEN. EVEN IF SOMEONE HAS SOMETHING UNLOCKED, DO NOT TREAT THAT AS FREE REIGN TO TAKE ITEMS</>

<TextStyle.Yellow>PLEASE DO NOT BUILD CLOSE TO AN EXISTING BASE</>

tab3.text1:
<TextStyle.Yellow>XP - 3x</>
<TextStyle.Yellow>HARVEST - 5x</>
<TextStyle.Yellow>TAMING - 9x</>

<TextStyle.Red>CHARACTER POINTS PER LEVEL</>

<TextStyle.Yellow>HP - 25</>
<TextStyle.Yellow>STAM - 25</>
<TextStyle.Yellow>WEIGHT - 25</>
<TextStyle.Yellow>SPEED - 3%</>
<TextStyle.Yellow>FORTITUDE - 8</>
<TextStyle.Yellow>ALL OTHER STATS ARE DEFAULT</>

<TextStyle.Red>BREEDING</>

<TextStyle.Yellow>MATING INTERVAL - 0.10x</>
<TextStyle.Yellow>MATING SPEED - 10x</>
<TextStyle.Yellow>EGG LAY INTERVAL - 0.10x</>
<TextStyle.Yellow>EGG HATCH SPEED - 20X</>
<TextStyle.Yellow>BABY MATURATION SPEED - 10X</>
tab3.text2:
<TextStyle.Yellow>PLAYER MOVEMENT SPEED - ENABLED</>
<TextStyle.Yellow>FLYER MOVEMENT SPEED - ENABLED</>
<TextStyle.Yellow>CAVE FLYING - ENABLED</>
<TextStyle.Yellow>FLYER CARRY - ENABLED</>
<TextStyle.Yellow>MAX DINO LEVEL - 150</>
<TextStyle.Yellow>PLATFORM STRUCTURE LIMIT - 2x</>


<TextStyle.Yellow>***REMEMBER - RATES ARE DOUBLED ON THE WEEKENDS!***</>

tab4.text1:
<TextStyle.Yellow>*The server shop is accessed by pressing F2. You are able to purchase items/dinos/packages with the amount of points stated on the item.</>

<TextStyle.Yellow>*10 points are awarded every 5 minutes of playtime.</>

<TextStyle.Yellow>*You must be online in order to accrue points.</>

<TextStyle.Yellow>*Items will be added/modified/removed as needed to properly accommodate the server.</>

<TextStyle.Yellow>*If you have a suggestion for an item to be added you can suggest on the discord under the #suggestions channel.</>

tab5.text1:
<TextStyle.Yellow>*Automated Ark</>
<TextStyle.Yellow>*Solo Farm Mod</>

<TextStyle.Yellow>*Super Spyglass Plus</>
<TextStyle.Yellow>*Dazza's Stacking Mod</>
<TextStyle.Yellow>*Better Torches</>
<TextStyle.Yellow>*ArkNav (minimap)</>
<TextStyle.Yellow>*Auto Doors</>
<TextStyle.Yellow>*Resonant's Shop Mod</>
<TextStyle.Yellow>*Crafting Skill Potion</>


<TextStyle.Yellow>IF YOU HAVE A SUGGESTION FOR ANOTHER MOD PLEASE MAKE A POST IN #SUGGESTIONS CHANNEL IN DISCORD</>
